com.google.template.soy.msgs
Class SoyMsgBundle

java.lang.Object
  com.google.template.soy.msgs.SoyMsgBundle
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<com.google.template.soy.msgs.restricted.SoyMsg>
public class SoyMsgBundle
extends Object
implements Iterable<com.google.template.soy.msgs.restricted.SoyMsg>

Represents a full set of messages in some language/locale.

Constructor Detail

SoyMsgBundle

public SoyMsgBundle(@Nullable
                    String localeString,
                    List<com.google.template.soy.msgs.restricted.SoyMsg> msgs)
Important: Do not use this constructor from non-Soy code! This constructor being public is only a temporary state. Note: If there exist duplicate message ids in the msgs list, the first one wins. However, the source paths from subsequent duplicates will be added to the source paths for the message.

Parameters:
localeString - The language/locale string of this bundle of messages, or null if unknown. Should only be null for bundles newly extracted from source files. Should always be set for bundles parsed from message files/resources.
msgs - The list of messages. List order will become the iteration order.
Method Detail

getLocaleString

public String getLocaleString()
Gets the language/locale string of this bundle of messages (see note in SoyMsgBundle class doc).

Returns:
The language/locale string of the messages provided by this bundle.

getMsg

public com.google.template.soy.msgs.restricted.SoyMsg getMsg(long msgId)
Retrieves a message by its unique message id.

Parameters:
msgId - The message id of the message to retrieve.
Returns:
The corresponding message, or null if not found.

getNumMsgs

public int getNumMsgs()
Gets the number of messages in this bundle.

Returns:
The number of messages in this bundle.

iterator

public Iterator<com.google.template.soy.msgs.restricted.SoyMsg> iterator()
Returns an iterator over all the messages.
